survey_name: Smart Refrigerator Features and Usage Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to understand consumer preferences and usage patterns related to smart refrigerator features to guide product development and marketing strategies.

questions.question_text: Which of the following smart refrigerator features do you currently use or are most interested in?
answer_options: Recipe suggestions based on available ingredients
Voice control or smart assistant integration
Remote temperature control via smartphone app
Internal cameras for viewing contents remotely
questions.client_notes: Use a multi-choice format to allow selection of multiple features. Ensure options are randomized to avoid bias.
